肯特之心临终关怀中心任命 Bedfont 和 NewMed 为 2024/25 年 Bluebell Walk 的主要赞助商https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Heart-of-Kent-Hospice-appoints-Bedfont-and-NewMed-as-Headline-Sponsors-for-Bluebell-Walk-202425.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Heart-of-Kent-Hospice-appoints-Bedfont-and-NewMed-as-Headline-Sponsors-for-Bluebell-Walk-202425.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dcba3b3-a22b-466b-811b-20a4a521777c Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:10:00 -0500 Heart of Kent Hospice appoints Bedfont and NewMed as Headline Sponsors for Bluebell Walk 2024/25
遗传风险工具可以帮助多发性硬化症患者的早期诊断和治疗一种新的遗传风险工具可以使年轻人免于失明，该工具还可以帮助及早诊断多发性硬化症（MS），从而开始有效的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Genetic-risk-tool-could-aid-early-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-multiple-sclerosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Genetic-risk-tool-could-aid-early-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-multiple-sclerosis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f07606a-75a8-44c1-9a27-edf9dede0106 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 07:01:52 -0500 Genetic risk tool could aid early diagnosis and treatment of multiple sclerosis patients
ChatGPT 通过药物再利用帮助发现潜在的阿尔茨海默病治疗方法ChatGPT-4 用于识别针对阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的药物再利用候选药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/ChatGPT-aids-in-discovering-潜在-Alzheimere28099s-treatments-through-drug-repurifying.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/ChatGPT-aids-in-discovering-潜在-Alzheimere28099s-treatments-through-drug-repurifying.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9686fa08-333c-41e6-9b8f-346ca9fae48d Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:55:00 -0500 ChatGPT aids in discovering potential Alzheimer’s treatments through drug repurposing
使用机器学习来确定痴呆症患者死亡率的关键预测因素西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员和其他人利用机器学习的力量来确定痴呆症患者死亡率的关键预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Using-machine-learning-to-identify-key-predictors-of-mortality-in-dementia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Using-machine-learning-to-identify-key-predictors-of-mortality-in-dementia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae50783-2e4a-4e4c-9ac1-bdce8f43c471 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:46:30 -0500 Using machine learning to identify key predictors of mortality in dementia patients
大麻使用者患心脏病和中风的风险可能更高对美国 430,000 名成年人的分析发现，即使在控制烟草使用（可燃香烟和其他烟草制品）后，使用大麻（最常见的是通过吸食、食用或蒸发大麻）与心脏病发作和中风的较高风险显着相关和其他心血管危险因素，根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的新研究，该杂志是美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Cannabis-users-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-heart-attack-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Cannabis-users-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-heart-attack-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3fc1390-29b4-409c-883e-f8242d2f2164 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:33:10 -0500 Cannabis users may be at higher risk of heart attack and stroke
研究发现开菲尔有望改善 ICU 患者的肠道健康开菲尔给药对危重成人肠道微生物组的安全性、可行性和影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Kefir-shows-promise-in-improving-gut-health-of-ICU-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Kefir-shows-promise-in-improving-gut-health-of-ICU-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede147f5-005a-4cbe-86c2-2d4110bcdef4 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:26:00 -0500 Kefir shows promise in improving gut health of ICU patients, study finds
确定可预测类风湿关节炎患者心血管风险的新血液生物标志物类风湿性关节炎影响着美国大约 200 万人，并且与心血管疾病的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/New-blood-biomarkers-identified-to-predict-cardioangio-risk-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-fighters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/New-blood-biomarkers-identified-to-predict-cardioangio-risk-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=877b2883-0f86-4eec-927f-1ff3a33ec516 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:23:16 -0500 New blood biomarkers identified to predict cardiovascular risk in rheumatoid arthritis patients
再说一遍：使用助听器对于老年人来说可能会令人沮丧，但这是必要的这是每天的例行公事，充满了挫败感。我丈夫于 2022 年去世，享年 94 岁，每次打电话给他的父亲时，他都会等父亲找到助听器并戴上，然后才开始说话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Say-that-again-Using-hearing-aids-can-be-frustrating-for-older-adults-but-necessary.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Say-that-again-Using-hearing-aids-can-be-frustrating-for-older-adults-but-necessary.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7bb046c-b994-461b-8f02-317dbce0cce7 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:58:31 -0500 Say that again: Using hearing aids can be frustrating for older adults, but necessary
加州诉讼凸显对医疗保健反偏见培训的广泛法律攻击洛杉矶麻醉师玛丽莲·辛格尔顿对加利福尼亚州的一项要求感到愤怒，该要求要求每门继续医学教育课程都包括隐性偏见培训——医生的无意识态度可能会导致医疗保健中的种族和民族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/California-lawsuit-spotlights-broad-legal-attack-on-anti-bias-training-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/California-lawsuit-spotlights-broad-legal-attack-on-anti-bias-training-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21acfee6-67a2-45b1-9e4e-b44662c8ca21 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:55:35 -0500 California lawsuit spotlights broad legal attack on anti-bias training in health care
一条胳膊和一条腿：等等，现在胰岛素便宜了吗？去年，生产胰岛素的制药公司自愿同意提供折扣卡，将许多人的胰岛素每月费用降低至 35 美元，从而成为头条新闻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-Wait-is-Insulin-cheaper-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-Wait-is-Insulin-cheaper-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1550554f-340c-4d4a-ab61-28706ba84a29 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:53:50 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: Wait, is Insulin cheaper now?
